original_title: Woman killed, another injured in hit and run
original_body_lines: A woman was killed and another injured in a fatal accident on the High-Level Road in Galawilawatta, Homagama last night, Police said.
Investigations revealed that they had been knocked down by a van and had fallen on the road after which they had been run over by a lorry travelling on the opposite lane.
Police said they gave chase and seized the van that sped away from the scene and arrested the driver.

The deceased Siriyarachchige Sujeewa Samanthi (30) was a resident of Eheliyagoda, employed in a garment factory in Galawilawatta. She with a fellow worker was crossing the road to go to a nearby hotel to buy a packet of meal when they had met with the accident.

The two women who received serious injuries were rushed to Homagama base hospital where one of them was pronounced already dead. The other young woman in critical condition was admitted to the Intensive Care Unit. (Buddhika Kumarasiri)
